capability.name: Product Inventory Item Management
capability.role: Maintain the available central product materials inventory in coordination with distribution activities and new product/materials ordering, receipt and warehousing
capability.example: Newly developed product inventory is distributed as part of a product deployment project

key_features.name: Maintain product inventory
key_features.description: Enables maintain product inventory to support maintain and distribute product inventory

key_features.name: Administer the distribution of inventory
key_features.description: Enables administer the distribution of inventory to support maintain and distribute product inventory

key_features.name: Request stock replenishment
key_features.description: Enables request stock replenishment to support maintain and distribute product inventory
